B

BasicScoreModifier - Class in com.github.harverst.roper.model
A ScoreModifier uses a modifier function to change the value of a score Implements compareTo using a protected precedence variable to determine the order that the modifiers will be applied.
BasicScoreModifier(int) - Constructor for class com.github.harverst.roper.model.BasicScoreModifier
The constructor sets the order in which the modifier is executed.
